Detailed Description

Quantum random bit generator class.

This class provides a PHP wraper for the QRand Command-line Utility [v0.2, 2007-07-17].

The following constant must be defined:

  • BOO_QRBG_CMD = The qrand command '/PATH_TO/./qrand'.
  • BOO_QRBG_CACHE = Use cache (bool).
  • BOO_QRBG_CACHE_SIZE = Size of cache, try setting to 1000.
  • BOO_QRBG_USERNAME = Your QRBG Service username.
  • BOO_QRBG_PASSWORD = Your QRBG Service password.
License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License

http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework

Author:

Version:
2.0.5
Required:
http://random.irb.hr/ QRand Command-line Utility [v0.2, 2007-07-17]
